channel.title: Straight Newbee But I Want Whonix
channel.description: Hi, I want the security of whonix. I just purchased a windows 8 machine and wanted to know if there were some not too techie, easy to follow manual so I can install whonix. Or, do I have to be a Linux wiz before whonix will benefit me. Then I'll move on to ethical hacking classes later LOL

item.title: Straight Newbee But I Want Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
How did you manage to post as guest?

The answer is: it depends.

For one, a Windows host is certainly not the safest way to run Whonix.

There is https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation which covers a lot. Not sure if that is simple language. Certainly, knowledge about Debian Linux is helpful as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian.

Read full topic
item.source: Straight Newbee But I Want Whonix
